roleset.name: removal of material from the surface of an object; removal of functionality; controlled surgical removal of a body part

example.text: 4. 2006 - Radiofrequency ablation of one lesion seen on a PET scan in the right lobe of the liver.
example.amr: (s / see-01 :li 4 :ARG1 (a / ablate-01 :ARG1 (s2 / sign-symptom :quant 1 :name (n / name :op1 "lesion")) :ARG2 (a2 / anatomical-site :name (n2 / name :op1 "right" :op2 "lobe") :part-of (a3 / anatomical-site :name (n3 / name :op1 "liver"))) :ARG3 (r / radiofrequency)) :instrument (p / pet-02 :ARG2 a) :time (d / date-entity :year 2006))
